name: HappyNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Happy News is an Alexa flash briefing skill that delivers the latest positive news posted on Good News Network. The sources feed is located at https://www.goodnewsnetwork.org and is not owned by developer.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
